title: Opening
description: All around the world user groups and communities want to learn about Azure and Cloud Computing! On April 27, 2019, all communities around the world will come together once again in the sixth great Global Azure Bootcamp event! Each user group will organize their own one day deep dive class on Azure the way they see fit and how it works for their members. The result is that thousands of people get to learn about Azure and join together online under the social hashtag #GlobalAzure.
name: Anton Boyko and Sergii Bielskyi

title: Global Science Lab
description: Have you ever wanted to discover a planet? How about discovering a planet around another star? We are super excited about the lab this year and have once again teamed up with the Instituto de Astrofisica de Canarias in Tenerife to bring you something really interesting, read below for a message direct from the team at IAC.
name: Anton Boyko

title: Racing Game Lab
description: The Racing Game Lab will bring together the attendees of the Global Bootcamp locations around the world to cooperate and compete in a 3D driving game using Azure for back-end game services. The game allows players to drive laps, score points, and unlock achievements for their country as they compete to set the fastest lap times on the three tracks in the game. New for 2019, the game will feature an AI mode, in which you will be able to evolve an AI to evolve and learn how to drive around the track.
name: Sergii Bielskyi

title: Break
description: It's a good time to socialize and network!

title: Team development in Azure Kubernetes Service
description: In this presentation we will look at Azure Dev spaces and how to collaborate between development team in AKS. You will learn tips and tricks in building, testing scenarios and do end – to – end testing with other components without replicating or mocking up dependencies.
name: Sergii Bielskyi

title: Lunch break
description:
Lunches are provided free of charge to every registered attendee.

It's a good time to socialize and network!

title: Azure DevOps quality gates - delivering apps with predictable quality
name: Anton Boyko

title: Break
description: It's a good time to socialize and network!

title: Evolution of the Azure solution in geodistibuted mode
name: Illia Lubenets

title: Order from Chaos
